text: The River is a 1984 American drama movie directed by Mark Rydell and starring Mel Gibson, Sissy Spacek, James Tolkan, Jack Starrett, Scott Glenn. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was a box office failure. It was nominated for 5 Academy Awards and won an Academy Award in 1985. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1984 drama movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Rydell Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Tennessee Category:Movies set on farms Category:Movies about farmers Category:Academy Award winning movies
title: The River (1984 movie)
